name: Cube Road
description:
Hey buddy, do you like CUBES? Then Cube Road is the game for YOU! Over 30* cubes to run, collect, enjoy, in over 100** stages, with password save system***! Cubes truly are the future of gaming!

*not entirely accurate

**also not entirely accurate

***this is actually true

Based on this Famicom 2019 case by Hangedman Design:

Leg it across cubes, pinball off them, smack your bonce on their bottoms, all in a borderline-chaotic puzzle/action/platformer especially designed for cube lovers! 

ARROW KEYS = movement.

Each level has a name taken from this list of 10,000 Statistically Grammar Average Band Names *LINK*, which also doubles as the password for that level. You can load and play any level by entering the name/password, so grab a pen to make a note of the relevant names, just like in the good old days before computers did everything for you.

And what do you mean "Cubes are three dimensional shapes! Otherwise it's just a square!" QUIET, YOU.

-----------

This is effectively a demo as I currently have a newborn at home so didn't have time to finish the full game before the A Game By Its Cover 2019 game jam deadline. However, I have a ton of ideas ready to implement so my intention is to keep working on this when I have time ^_^
